string.name: changelog_master
string.Data:
Nightly build:

*** TODO: Need some introductionary text about the SAF change ***

Map:

  • Change: Merged \"show direction\" and \"Routing mode\" settings (map quick settings popup)
  • New: Added OpenAndroMaps to MapDownloader (for offline map files and map themes)
  • New: Multi-threaded rendering for OpenStreetMap maps (optional, default is on)

Cache details:

  • New: Swipe down to refresh cache details and trackable list

Other:

  • New: Set user-defined coords for waypoints on GPX import even when original waypoint has no coords
